name: Lovesighted
description:
Welcome to my submission page for the BrackeysGameJam 2! For the gamejam I made Lovesighted, a 3D-isometric exploration-combat game with a small narrative. Fight against Slime Skeltons while trying to find a Revival Orb to revive your love, cause what could go wrong. 

Controls: WASD to move, Return to Attack, Space to Interact with Certain Objects, Q to use a Flask to Heal if you have one.

How to Play: Explore the world and fight enemies you encounter. Gain score from gems, but the ultimate goal is to find the revival orb. If you die, youll drop 10% of your score as a pink gem. If you die before picking it up, it'll be gone for good!

I will be releasing in the next week or so a process video with commentary about the entire gamejam! Keep a look out for that.

Note: I'm curious if anyone is interested in seeing this project go further so let me know! 

Tools Used:

  • Unity 2019.1
  • Blender2.8/ProBuilder
  • Clip Studio Paint
